app.title: Reformation/Ubugorozi
app.error_description:
Porogaramu yahuye n'ikibazo. 
Muze kwongera kugerageza mu kanya.
app.no_conn_msg:
Murebe umurongo wa interneti yanyu, 
Mwongere kugerageza mukanya

lesson.mathew24_14: Kandi ubu butumwa bwiza bw'ubwami buzigishwa amahanga yose nibwo imperuka izaherako ize
